name: Sunrise Fuji - Hatsuhinode!
description:
What is Hatsuhinode? Curiosities for those who do not know.

Hatsuhinode (はつひ の で or 初 日 の 出) means the first sunrise of the year in Japanese.

Ancient Japanese believed that the sun is one of thousands of gods and just like in any myth, belief or customs, many still hold the tradition of witnessing HATSUHINODE and go to the beach, mountain to see and pray on the first sunrise of the year. Curiocity of those who do not know.
